mdRecord.dcterms:description: This Viennese Secessionist house designed by Tom P. Barnett in 1909. In Charles Savage's book, Architecture of the Private Streets of St. Louis, he says, "Perhaps nowhere in this country was there a better example of the influence of Otto Wagner and contemporary Austrian design." -- http://www.tedwight.com/st_louis_real_estate_blog/2009/04/17-hortense-place.html [work]
